Source code for notable.core.exc

"""Notable core exceptions module."""



[docs]class NotableError(Exception):
    """Generic errors."""
    def __init__(self, msg):
        Exception.__init__(self)
        self.msg = msg

    def __str__(self):
        return self.msg




[docs]class NotableConfigError(NotableError):
    pass




[docs]class NotableRuntimeError(NotableError):
    pass




[docs]class NotableArgumentError(NotableError):
    pass
